subSections.title: Readings
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|えい|yomi=kun}}
From {{der|ja|ain|sort=えい|アイ|tr=ay||arrow|pos=by extension, "point"}}, by its stingers {{rfv-etymology|ja}}.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|えい|エイ|hhira=えひ|hkata=エヒ}}

# [[ray]] {{gloss|a kind of cartilaginous fish}}

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: * ''Ei'' refers to rays in general. Stingrays commonly found in Japan are called {{ja-r|赤%鱏|アカ%エイ|[[w:Red stingray|red stingray]]}}

subSections.title: Noun
